title: October 7, 2019: Pundi X (NPXS): Up 0.51%; Unusual Moves In Transfers Added
text:
Pundi X: What’s the Latest Regarding its Price?

Pundi X’s current price, at the time of this writing, is $0.0002173 USD, up by approximately 0.51% from the day prior. Yesterday’s up day is a reversal of the day before it; in terms of trend, though, note that the current price is now 23.37% below its 20 day moving average, and is currently in a down trend over the past 14 days. In terms of an expected trading range, the Bollinger bands on Pundi X suggest price may bounce between $0.00019 and $0.000377 based on its momentum and volatility over the past 14 days. Given its boundaries, rangebound traders may find it compelling to entertain buying, as we are nearer to the bottom of the range.

Trade Pundi x (NPXS) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The market capitalization of Pundi X, or the amount of US dollars it would take to buy up all the circulating coins, is currently estimated to be $52 million.

Pundi X’s Surprises of the Day

Yesterday, the metrics transfers added saw a daily change well outside what is usually experienced. An exploration as to what caused this may be worthwhile.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

Over the past 24 hours, 3,339 transfers have been added to the blockchain recording transactions amongst holders of Pundi X. As for the number of holders, yesterday saw the number of wallets holding Pundi X jump by 93. If we observe percentage growth in holders and transfers, we find that Pundi X ranks 8 out of the 32 Ethereum tokens we are tracking.

How are the Strong Holders of Pundi X Faring?

In terms of wealth concentration, the richest 1,000 wallets own 88.1% of the coin’s total money supply. The percent of the currency that is owned by wallets that are both belonging to exchanges and in the top 1,000 richest wallets of the token comes out to 12.11% of the currency’s money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by -0.16% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by 3.67%. The underlying smart contract itself for Pundi X owns 0.02% of the total money supply; over the past week, this amount has not changed.

How Active are the Software Developers?

Pundi X hasn’t had any activity on any of its GitHub repos since September 27, 2019 — 10 days prior. Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Pundi X’s GitHub repositories grow by 0 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 0.03.

Pundi X’s Social Media Presence

Social media growth, in terms of Twitter followers and Reddit subscribers, came in at up 67 and 1 over the past day for Pundi X. Traders interested in following Pundi X has the biggest presence on Twitter, where it has 66,543 users engaged. Use this link to follow Pundi X on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Pundi x, listed under the symbol NPXS, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX.

Article by SixJupiter
